Here's a new elevator pitch for PREVENT-IA:

"Imagine a workplace where employees are empowered with the knowledge and skills to prevent accidents and ensure their own safety. PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform that makes this a reality. Designed for workers, managers, and site managers, our platform provides on-site access to occupational risk prevention training, personalized learning paths, and real-time monitoring of training outcomes. With PREVENT-IA, you can reduce workplace accidents, improve training tracking, and enhance overall safety. Unlike competing products that focus solely on certification, PREVENT-IA offers a comprehensive solution that combines AI-powered learning with human expertise. By using PREVENT-IA, you can ensure that your employees are equipped with the knowledge and skills they need to prevent accidents and stay safe on the job. Join the PREVENT-IA community today and take the first step towards a safer, more productive workplace."
